pullRequest.title: Fix sonarcloud analysis on merge PR
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the pull request
#1706 Fix sonarcloud analysis on merge PR
#1718 Sonarcloud analyze improve
Brief change log

.github/workflows/ci_ut.yml


add push condition
add -Dsonar.junit.reportPaths=target/cobertura   -Dmaven.test.skip=true with Sonarcloud maven command.


dolphinscheduler-ui/pom.xml


add <sonar.sources>src</sonar.sources>


pom.xml


add <outputDirectory>./target/cobertura</outputDirectory>

Test Result

commit.message: #1706 fix sonarcloud analysis on merge PR
sonarcloud use cobertura report and don't run UT again; include ui source file; merge to one workflow

nodes.bodyText:
Why not put the job in this work flow? Trigger can be push and pull_request?
我看基本上没啥变化，都放到这里push和pull_request就可以了吧？
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -49,18 +49,6 @@ jobs:
           export MAVEN_OPTS='-Dmaven.repo.local=.m2/repository -XX:+TieredCompilation -XX:TieredStopAtLevel=1 -XX:+CMSClassUnloadingEnabled -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:-UseGCOverheadLimit -Xmx3g'
           mvn test -Dmaven.test.skip=false cobertura:cobertura
           CODECOV_TOKEN="09c2663f-b091-4258-8a47-c981827eb29a" bash <(curl -s https://codecov.io/bash)
-      - name: Run SonarCloud analysis
